00001 #include "ConstantCalibration.hh"
00002 #include "CalibrationKit.hh"
00003 #include "CalibrationFactory.hh"

00005 #include <cstdlib>
00006 
00013 class ConstantCalibrationKit : public CalibrationKit
00014 {
00015 protected:
00016   ConstantCalibrationKit() {
00017     CalibrationFactory *instance=CalibrationFactory::getInstance();
00018     instance->registerCalibrationKit("ConstantCalibration",this);
00019   };
00020 
00021   static ConstantCalibrationKit __instance;
00022 
00023 public:
00028   Calibration *create(const std::string &module_type_col_name,  const std::string &module_calibration_col_name) const {
00029     Float_t a_scale=static_cast<Float_t>(strtod(module_calibration_col_name.c_str(),0));
00030     std::cout << "CalibrationKit::create> Create ConstantCalibration (scale=" << a_scale << " ." << std::endl;
00031     if (a_scale<=0.) {
00032       throw std::runtime_error("ConstantCalibrationKit::create> The collection name for the calibration constant"
00033                                " is missused ass the scaling value. The value is not a positive number."
00034                                " Please set the collection name of the calibration constant collection to a"
00035                                " positve float value.");
00036     }
00037     return new ConstantCalibration(a_scale);
00038   };
00039 };
